name: Hologram Laser Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Hologram.
The hologram laser simulator - a simulation game where you can play on your phone like a 3D hologram laser! Tired of the usual holograms and lasers? Try that shines a laser beam is not just!
The game uses a camera for a more realistic effect! Show your friends your laser hologram! Let them think that you have a different hologram!
Love beautiful lasers? Choose different types of lasers and included!
There are lasers in the form of a skull, airplane. gun, etc.
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Thank you for playing our applications! Leave us feedback and we try to make our games even more interesting for you!
